QuestData.Title: Wailing Coin
QuestData.Description:
<The odd coin appears to be from a forgotten time. As you hold it, you are haunted by the cries of suffering souls.
Ve'nari may recognize the coin's value.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Wailing Coin to Ve'nari at Ve'nari's Refuge.
QuestData.RewardText:
An intriguing piece of currency.
I would be most interested to learn how it was minted...
